'''Surtalogi''', also known as '''The Foul''', is a mentioned character in ''[[Genshin Impact]].'' He is [[Skirk]]'s master, the owner of the [[All-Devouring Narwhal]] and one of the [[Five Sinners of Khaenri'ah]].

==Profile==
Surtalogi is first mentioned by [[Skirk]] in the {{Quest|The Opera of Noirceur and Blancheur}}.

Surtalogi is the master of Skirk and the owner of the [[All-Devouring Narwhal]], who he sees as a pet. When asked about what kind of entity Surtalogi is, Skirk states that he is someone similar to [[Rhinedottir]] and [[Vedrfolnir]] in "pursuing some form of perfection."<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Opera of Noirceur and Blancheur}}</ref>

At some point, Surtalogi tasked Skirk with finding an ancient [[voyager]] from beyond Teyvat.<ref name=FotDG>{{Ref/ArtiSet|Finale of the Deep Galleries}}</ref>

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Surtalogi is the name of the bright sword or flame wielded by the Fire Jotunn {{w|Surtr}} from Norse Mythology.
